author: Lukas Reiter
script:
"""
This script extracts all parameters from in-scope HTTP requests and adds them to the 
table above for further analysis.
"""
import traceback

# Do the initial setup
if ref == 1 or "dedup" not in session:
	session["dedup"] = {}
	header = ["Ref.", "URL", "Type", "Parameter", "Value", "Reflective", "Content-Type (Response)"]

# Process only in-scope HTTP requests and responses
if in_scope:
	request = message_info.getRequest()
	response = message_info.getResponse()
	request_info = helpers.analyzeRequest(request)
	if response:
		response_info = helpers.analyzeResponse(response)
		response_string = helpers.bytesToString(response)
		_, content_type = get_header(response_info.getHeaders(), "Content-Type")
		content_type = content_type if content_type else ""
	else:
		response_string = ""
		content_type = ""
	for param in request_info.getParameters():
		type = get_parameter_name(param.getType())
		name = param.getName()
		value = param.getValue()
		reflected = value in response_string
		try:
			dedup = "{}|{}|{}".format(type, name, unicode(value), reflected, content_type)
			if dedup not in session["dedup"]:
				rows.append([ref, url, type, name, helpers.urlDecode(value), reflected, content_type])
				session["dedup"][dedup] = True
		except:
			rows.append([ref, url, type, name, helpers.urlDecode(value)])
			traceback.print_exc(file=callbacks.getStderr())
name: Parameter - Template Script to Extract Parameter Names and Values from All In-Scope Requests
